paper.title: The Case for Integrating ESG into Fixed-Income Portfolios
paper.abstract: In this article we investigate the possible benefits of integrating ESG considerations into fixed-income portfolios. Our initial results indicated that such considerations could have a significant impact on portfolio returns. Our more formal use of regression analysis demon-strated that the impact on returns was negligible. The authors did find tentative evidence, however, to suggest that enhancing the ESG credentials of a portfolio can lead to a reduction in a portfolio's tail risk

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究了将ESG因素整合到固定收益投资组合中的影响，这直接涉及投资组合管理。此外，论文还提到ESG因素可能降低投资组合的尾部风险，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
